forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunder possible. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning followed by occasional showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. High 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
